title: Data Analysis: Sampling Distribution
question_text:
Suppose a sample of size $ n = 8$ is taken of high school studentsâ€™ ACT scores.
If the population mean is $23$ with a standard deviation of $2.4$, determine the sampling distribution of samples like this of size $n = 8$.
